solution_line_template: It takes 10 minutes to wash 4 windows and he has {total_windows} windows so that breaks down to {total_windows}/{windows_per_unit} = {number_of_units} units

It takes {minutes_per_unit} minutes to wash a unit of windows and he has {number_of_units} units so {minutes_per_unit}*{number_of_units} = <<{minutes_per_unit}*{number_of_units}={total_minutes}>>{total_minutes} minutes
